params.operator: The address of the operator to deregister.

params.blockNumber: The block number to query at.

returns._0: The quorum numerator at the given block.
returns._1: The quorum denominator at the given block.

params.blockNumber: The block number to query at.

returns._0: The threshold weight at the given block.

params.blockNumber: The block number to query at.

returns._0: The total weight at the given block.

params.signingKeyAddress: The address of the signing key.

returns._0: The latest operator address associated with the signing key, or address(0) if none.
The latest signing key of the operator.

params.blockNumber: The block number to query at.

returns._0: The signing key of the operator at the given block.
The current weight of the operator

params.blockNumber: The block number to query at.

returns._0: The weight of the operator at the given block.

params.initialOwner: The initial owner of the contract.
params.thresholdWeight: The threshold weight in basis points.

params.digest: The hash of the data that is signed.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.operator: The address of the operator to register.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateOperatorSigningKey(address,bytes).details: Only callable by the operator themselves.

params.newSigningKey: The new signing key to set for the operator.
params.signingKeySignature: The signature of the operator's new signing key.

params.operator: The address of the operator to update the weight for.
params.weight: The new weight to set for the operator.

params.thresholdWeight: The updated threshold weight required to validate a message.

getLastCheckpointQuorumAtBlock(uint32).notice: Retrieves the quorum at a specific block number.

getLastCheckpointThresholdWeight().notice: Retrieves the last recorded threshold weight.

getLastCheckpointThresholdWeightAtBlock(.notice: Retrieves the threshold weight at a specific block number.

getLastCheckpointTotalWeight().notice: Retrieves the last recorded total weight across all operators.

getLastCheckpointTotalWeightAtBlock(uint.notice: Retrieves the total weight at a specific block number.

getLatestOperatorForSigningKey(address).notice: Returns the latest operator address associated with a signing key.

getLatestOperatorSigningKey(address).notice: Retrieves the latest signing key for a given operator.

getOperatorSigningKeyAtBlock(address,uin.notice: Retrieves the signing key for an operator at a specific block.

getOperatorWeightAtBlock(address,uint32).notice: Retrieves the operator's weight at a specific block number.

initialize(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Initializes the contract with the given parameters.

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).notice: Validates a signature against the signer's address and data hash.

operatorRegistered(address).notice: Returns whether an operator is currently registered.

registerOperator(address,uint256).notice: Registers a new operator using a provided operator address and weight.

updateOperatorSigningKey(address,bytes).notice: Updates the signing key for an operator.

updateOperatorWeight(address,uint256).notice: Updates the weight for an operator.

updateStakeThreshold(uint256).notice: Sets a new cumulative threshold weight for message validation.
